text:
[Verse]
Twilight is calling
Hearts feel the beat
Stars softly falling
Down to the street

[Verse 2]
Night's gentle whispers
Wind in the trees
Hands start to shimmer
Lost in the breeze

[Chorus]
Dancing under moonlight
Love in our sight
Step into the magic
Feel the delight

[Verse 3]
Echoes of laughter
Fill the cool air
Moments that capture
Dreams we can share

[Verse 4]
Footsteps in rhythm
Two hearts entwined
No one to miss them
Leave cares behind

[Chorus]
Dancing under moonlight
Love in our sight
Step into the magic
Feel the delight
title: Dancing Under Moonlight
